peekDoor.name: Peek Door
peekDoor.hint: Clicking on a door while this key is pressed will cause it to open slightly.

revealSecretDoor.name: Reveal Secret Door
revealSecretDoor.hint: Clicking on a door with this key pressed will cause it to go from a secret door to a regular door.

disarmTrappedDoor.name: Disarm Trapped Door
disarmTrappedDoor.hint: Clicking on a door with this key pressed will toggle whether or not the trap associated with it is armed.

pauseOnTrap.name: Pause on Trap
pauseOnTrap.hint: Pause the game when a trapped door is triggered.

openOnTrap.name: Open on Trap
openOnTrap.hint: Open the door when a trapped door is triggered.

pause.always: Pause the game when this door is opened
pause.once: Pause the game when this door is opened for the first time
pause.note: If both options are checked, the game will pause every time the door is opened.

trap.note: If a trap is chosen here, it will be active

key.generate: Generate a key for this door
key.note: If a key is already generated for this door, nothing will happen
